website_summaries.verdict: This duo's birthday theme makes the pair a good choice for collectors or as a unique birthday gift, and also a solid 2-for-1 deal.
pros: An adorable set that includes Pusheen and Stormy with a birthday theme
The duo comes with a birthday cake and party hat, and is a good value for 2
cons: A few consumers gripe about the packaging arriving mashed or torn
Some found the dolls to be smaller than expected

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE - MUCH SMALLER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Item is much smaller than advertised. Pusheen is advertised at 8.5" and the one that arrived was 5.5" at BEST! The quality seems good but you do not get the size advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Kaszyca

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: Product description is a lie. The listing states that Pusheen is 8.5 inches high and it is barely half that height. Very disappointed to see the truth when I received the items today. Returning to Amazon results in blacklisting, so I get stuck keeping an item that was not as advertised. I've reported vendor's listing as misleading and inaccurate. It's so sad that they feel they have to lie to make sales, especially about such a beloved icon.
customer_reviews.author: N. Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Size listed wrong
customer_reviews.text: Product is not accurate and description it is off by about 3 in it says that it's 8 in the description and just actually only 5
customer_reviews.author: joypuke

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS DUO OF PUSHEEN AND STORMY CELEBRATING OUR BIRTHDAYS! I got these whimsical cats item for our home, and I am so GLAD I did because people just love looking at it :)! It is well worth the price! It is made of excellent material. It arrived promptly and in great condition! Very well packaged! Life is to short not to have rated G joy!!!! I give this very awesome and fun item 5 stars 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
customer_reviews.author: vanmieghem

customer_reviews.title: guests for your birthday
customer_reviews.text: Awesome guests to bring to a birthday. Invited them through Amazon and they showed up for my girl's birthday days ahead of time. She was real thrilled. Only thing was pusheen ate the whole cake and left only a slice for my girl.
customer_reviews.author: FireTiger

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old daughter is obsessed with Aphmau and anime, so these little cuties were perfect for her. I taped them to a clear plastic dessert plate, so the chocolate icing wouldn’t get on the “fur”. She was thrilled when she say them, and now has them in her locker at school. These did come attached, and I cut them apart to make these into a cake topper, and no one seemed to notice. I do feel as though these are a little pricey for what you get, but you can’t put a price tag on your child’s happiness!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and well made cept for the box
customer_reviews.text: The little guys are super cute, but their box was torn quite badly when it arrived--ruining any collector's value. Luckily I didn't get them as a collectable but as a gift to be played with, but I could see how it'd be disappointing for others.
customer_reviews.author: J.L.

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than advertised
customer_reviews.text: These are much smaller than advertised. They are about half the size described. However, after reading multiple reviews with the same complaint prior to ordering, I was expecting them to be smaller than portrayed. Regardless, they are cute, authentic, and well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Hager

customer_reviews.title: Great size for play and SO cute!
customer_reviews.text: If your kid is into Pusheen, then these are absolutely adorable. I's like to purchase more from this collection. In general, I find plush animals to be overpriced- across the board with all stuffed animals/toys! Having said that, these are probably competitively priced since all stuffed animals are $$$ They came in a display box. Nice for gift wrapping.
customer_reviews.author: so bo

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! Must get for the Pusheen and Stormy fans out there!
customer_reviews.text: There are 3 collector sets available to purchase. The sunglasses, baker and birthday cake version (see photo). Get your favorite version or just get them all like we did!! Stormy's fur is very curly and Pusheen is very soft like all the others from Gund. Pusheen is 5-1/4" high by 4-1/4" wide and Stormy is 4" high by 3" wide. If you want a full video review of all three sets, check out our YouTube channel! - Our Pusheen Addiction
customer_reviews.author: Our Pusheen Addiction

customer_reviews.title: Made an Easy Birthday Gift for a Pusheen Lover
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was invited to a birthday party of someone I didn’t know well. It was her 12th Birthday and the only thing I was told other than candy was that she liked these Pusheen things. Had never heard of them but after a quick Amazon search thought this set would be appropriate (although I did wonder if others would think and therefore buy the same - but didn’t happen). Apparently it was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Jyen

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but second purchase came crushed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this product twice for two different kiddo bdays. It’s super cute. However, the second purchase came crushed and the so-called “collectible” box was bent on the top/side and torn at the corner as a result. That was disappointing—and looks horrible as a gift—like the gift was thoughtless or not given much care. Not sure I’ll risk this, again, so it could be my last purchase of this item.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: I loved it! The Pusheen and Stormy Set came in ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! The Pusheen and Stormy Set came in an already wrapped box and it wasn't cheap plastic. When I opened it they were soft, smelled pleasant, and were so fun to play with. I highly recommend this toy for anyone who is looking for a good present for a girl. It was amazing! I couldn't of loved it more! they were also averagely small, which meant I could take them anywhere. Purse, backpack, or just hold them! I am totally keeping the box to store and cherish it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift, well made and adorable
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered the book, " I am Pusheen" and just had to get the characters to go along with it. So very cute!!! It's for my granddaughters 4th birthday, I'm sure she'll Love it. I ordered the characters at the last minute and got same day delivery through Prime, came that night, b-day party next day. Very pleased with the book & little stuffed cats, just adorable, and the service of getting them so quickely was greatly appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: bubbiejake

customer_reviews.title: Cute, perfect for a birthday girl, but, of course, way overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knowing I didn't want to spend so much on a couple of small stuffed toys, but, if it is worth it to you, then buy it. My daughter was turning 9 during the COVID-19 pandemic and wanted a cat themed birthday party. This was meant as a consolation for not being able to have a party.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Morphs

customer_reviews.title: These characters are adorable and very sweet and cute too
customer_reviews.text: These characters are adorable and very sweet and cute too! I plan to place them beside my wife's birthday gift because she loves things like this!! Pusheen is actually 6 inches high not 8 1/2 as advertised, for those that might care about that.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable! I got this as a gift for christmas, and they are both high quality and cute. They're not huge though, about the size of a classic beanie baby, perfect to display on your desk. Pusheen's fur is extremely slick and smooth, and stormy's fur is more like a carpet texture. I can tell they'll last a long time, and I highly recommend them, as a gift or something for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine :)

customer_reviews.title: A Cute and Perfect Gift for any Pusheen or Cat fan
customer_reviews.text: Bought this is a last minute birthday gift. Arrived on time. The received lover how cute they are. They also loved how soft and detailed they are.
customer_reviews.author: AverageGradStudent

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I think Pusheen stuff is a little pricey overall, but these are totally worth the money for your birthday Pusheen lover!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: 3 inches shorter than advertised
customer_reviews.text: Agree with another poster (whose review I had not read prior to purchasing, unfortunately). The advertised height of pusheen at 8.5” is totally wrong—it’s closer to 5.5”. I was wanting something closer to the 9.5” pusheen my daughter had seen in store, but with Stormy as bonus. We’ll find out at Christmas whether she likes this with Stormy or I’ll send it back to get the larger one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mezei

customer_reviews.title: Not as ordered
customer_reviews.text: It is cute but I received the bakery stormy not the birthday one
customer_reviews.author: A Pot Of Joe Designs

customer_reviews.title: adorbs
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it for her birthday. it is so adorable>! Who doesn't love plushy cats. So cute.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Clifford

customer_reviews.title: Great stuffed animals!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely LOVES his Pusheen and Stormy! He carries them everywhere and sleeps with them every night! They are well made, and will last him a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Shakleford

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and soft but way too small
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 yo loves it because they're adorable and comes with 2 plushies, but for the money it is tiny.
customer_reviews.author: Casper

customer_reviews.title: So cute, look just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love these!! Very cute, just like the picture. These are packaged in a cardboard box, so the whiskers and decorations are NOT deformed like with the Pusheen products wrapped in plastic only. High price for plushies, though.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good for cat lovers
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how soft these are as I had them delivered. directly to my granddaughter. But I have been told that she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Rich

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, daughter loves
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute. My daughter loves anything Pusheen so I purchased these for her birthday. They came in a cute little box, look exactly as pictured. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Momto4

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, very well made. Purchased for my son'a 8th birthday, as he's massive Pusheen fan. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Luna Kille

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a co worker who likes these. I was worried the box was going to be crushed but it was in a plastic bag and in great shape!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Great as a cake topper with plastic wrap!
customer_reviews.text: We used saran wrap on the ice cream cake with these for a cake topper because Pusheen toppers are impossible to find. They were adorable and a wonderful surprise. Collectors likely wouldn't take them out of the packaging but at this price point, no need to save without enjoying.
customer_reviews.author: S. V.

customer_reviews.title: great condition and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: amazing quality, the box they came in was undamaged. they're just the right size to me judging from the preview picture! they're gonna be great birthday decorations for this new year 😄
customer_reviews.author: Kayo

customer_reviews.title: but still pretty cute. I recommend if it's the birthday of ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as I thought it'd be, but still pretty cute. I recommend if it's the birthday of a Pusheen lover such as my sister.
customer_reviews.author: Chii

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: This item was a gift. The packaging was perfect for gifting and the quality of stuffed toys were top notch
customer_reviews.author: Sandal

customer_reviews.title: Inacurrate and False description, FIX IT.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have read the reviews closer.... because just as someone noted, Pusheen is ~5.5" tall NOT 8.5" as is clearly stated in the description. Just great because I had it sent directly to get customized on Etsy into an expensive gift which came back completely useless due to it's pathetic size. Of course it can't be returned at this point. Fix the 'dam' description.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Betcher

customer_reviews.title: a big sloppy pusheen
customer_reviews.text: I think these things are a scam but my girlfriend loves them. I live to make her happy so it works out.
customer_reviews.author: MushaAleste

customer_reviews.title: Dynamic Duo
customer_reviews.text: I don't know who Pusheen and Stormy are. I'm not sure my daughter does, either. However, this pair has gone with us everywhere for the last two months straight. Good quality little animals for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Buttjams

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: They’re smaller than what you think.... but... it’s all in the description. I guess ...I didn’t pay much attention the size, (my fault), so it was a little surprising...
customer_reviews.author: thomas bostaph

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for someone who loves Pusheen. It is cute but smaller than I thought it would be. Check the measurements if that is a concern.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: They are too small but cute
customer_reviews.text: Too small. Cute but too tiny. My daughter wasn’t interested in playing with them because she said they were small
customer_reviews.author: Clara Diaz

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend it. Came in the box
customer_reviews.text: Really cute as a pair. I'd recommend it. Came in the box. Looked like the pictures. No odd variation that I can see.
customer_reviews.author: WingWei

customer_reviews.title: SMALLER than advertised!!
customer_reviews.text: The actual set is adorable, but the listing is for an 8.5" pusheen and the largest one is only about 5.5" at the very most! Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Katie D

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this cute little Pusheen cats. Good quality and were not cheaply made. The box was a little squished when it arrived, but the cats were unscathed.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and soft
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and nice to hold i was expecting them to be much larger but they fit in my palm and that's ok!! I like teddy bears that i can hold in my arms and i can't do that with these two but they are cute on my bedside table instead :) about 9.5"
customer_reviews.author: emma

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for Pusheen collector
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a friend who LOVES Pusheen! She was thrilled 😁
customer_reviews.author: rhv430

customer_reviews.title: Beat up box
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT for a hardcore collector. The box came all bent and mishapen and from where Pusheen is holding the Bday cake with his hands out, his eyes look a lil wonky. SO! Good gift for giftings sake, but bad for serious collectors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grand daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to carry in backpack. Grand daughter loved it
customer_reviews.author: David H Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Pusheen lovers you will love this
customer_reviews.text: Loved this. Came in and it was exactly as ordered, great value, great price and delivered on time

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and adorable, but small
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and adorable small sized Pusheen and Stormy. Great price with the deal of the day sale. My daughter loves them.

customer_reviews.title: Pusheen & Stormy Loveable Plush Cats
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter absolutely loves Pusheen and Stormy and she was so excited to receive both for her birthday!!! Thank you for making a 5 year old very happy!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my intentions. Used as a cake topper (placed Saran wrap at bottom to keep it clean), and much to the delight of my girl.

customer_reviews.title: They Are good quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: They are smaller than i thought but my daughter fell in love with Pusheen and stormy! They are good quality! Thank you I'm happy with my purchase! For sure buying more

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for my daughter. She loves cats and is especially fond of pusheen and stormy. The set is adorable! They are soft and she sleeps with them on her bed every night.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Olson

customer_reviews.title: Birthday set!
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with a pusheen toy. Box it came in was adorable. Both stuffed toys are on the small side but worth it.

customer_reviews.title: So Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Could these guys be any cuter or softer? So much fun and a big hit this holiday season for the Pusheen fan in my life.

customer_reviews.title: Good price if on sale.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them! Got them when they were on sale but had they been regular price I would not have bought them.

customer_reviews.title: Cute

customer_reviews.text: My niece loved these for her birthday present & my 12 year old daughter wanted them! They are super cute!

customer_reviews.title: Cute Pusheen birthday set!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! Nice touch to daughter’s birthday party table and now she loves playing with them.

customer_reviews.title: Small and cute.

product_meta.title: GUND Pusheen and Stormy Birthday Plush Stuffed Animals Collector, Gray, Set of 2
product_meta.description: Style:BirthdayPusheen is the snack-loving cat who loves to go on adventures with friends like Sloth, Stormy, Pip and Cheek in her popular webcomic with over 10 million social media fans! A 5.5-inch Pusheen holds a slice of delicious birthday cake while 5-inch Stormy sports a matching multi-color party hat topped with a plush poof in a 6.5-inch giftable box.
feature_bullets: PLUSH BIRTHDAY SET: This collector's set features Pusheen holding a plush birthday cake while Stormy sports a colorful birthday hat. Displays the sisters packed in a decorative gift box with window-style display.
SOFT & HUGGABLE: Made from a soft, huggable material that meets famous GUND quality standards, this plush toy features surface-washable construction for easy cleaning. Appropriate for ages 1 & up.
THE PERFECT GIFT: Our plush dolls, teddy bears & stuffed animals make perfect gifts for birthdays, baby showers, baptisms, Easter, Valentine's Day & more! A perfect gift for any Pusheen or cat lover!
QUALITY CUDDLES: Known for our huggable plush designs & gifts, our award-winning bears & toys appeal to all ages from infants & toddlers to adults. They're perfect for play, collecting & cuddling.
